author: ianna
body: * Integrate detailed cavern description in 2023D12 scenario * Add 24434.0 relval workflow to test it * Correct exception message from DDG4Builder * Remove overlaps which were introduced by a detailed cavern inclusion It is based on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/17942 @kpedro88, @calabria, @pietverwilligen - FYI Note: The Air mother volume changes and cable re-parenting were introduced in M2. Sensitive volumes are not affected. Fixed here: Another note: there are serious overlaps present (unrelated to cavern description and file restructuring). Probably, the most offensive is 133.2 cm extrusion: ``` mf:ME0RingP extruded by: mf:ME0RingP/mfshield:ShieldingAntinomyLead_1_ME0_1 ovlp=133.2 ```
title: 2023 Scenario and Workflow with Detailed Cavern
